name: Raw Soft Meat
description: Raw Soft Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with a Knife . Eating Raw Soft Meat will replenish Health there is a possibility of negative Status Effects when doing so. It is better to Cook first before eating.
crafted_at: the Butchery Bench using Raw Meat
